newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-DEPORTIVO BEAT VALENCIA TO MOVE SECOND.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-DEPORTIVO BEAT VALENCIA TO MOVE SECOND.

text.p: An early goal from French midfielder Corentin Martins gave Deportivo Coruna a 1-0 win over Valencia on Sunday and second place in the Spanish first division.
Deportivo are two points behind Real Madrid and two ahead of Barcelona, who lost 2-0 to the leaders on Saturday.
Fourth-placed Real Betis could afford to waste a penalty in despatching struggling Logrones 5-1. Newly-capped midfielder Roberto Rios scored twice.
